text: J-Bay Open a.k.a. Billabong Pro Jeffreys Bay is an event on the World Surf League. The event is held every year at Jeffreys Bay in Eastern Cape, South Africa. Inaugural winner Kelly Slater, and Mick Fanning share the most victories with 4.http://www.aspworldtour.com/archived-world-tour-rankings-and- results/ thumb == Results == {| class="wikitable"
